alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Litchfield and southeastern Dutchess Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 601 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pawling, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Milford, Pawling, New Preston, Wingdale, Gaylordsville, Bethlehem, Washington, Roxbury, Bridgewater, Warren, Hotchkissville, Baker Corner, Candlewood Trails, Lower Merryall, Marble Dale, Pecksville, Bulls Bridge, Upper Merryall, Erickson Corner and Bethlehem Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
